ISSUE.TITLE: Add notice that `.ws` domains are not supported on ZEIT.world
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: After discussing on slack. ZEIT.world can't support `.ws` (emoji domains) at the moment. Hosting on `now` is fine. It's just the DNS. The user could use cloudflare for DNS.

COMMIT.MESSAGE: domain-validation: add validation for .ws domains as in #365, ZEIT.world currently doesn't support .ws domains and user should receive a notice when adding aliases or adding domains
Added validation for `.ws` domains (#935) as in #365, ZEIT.world currently doesn't support .ws domains and user should receive a notice when adding aliases or adding domains
